context.note: Eucalyptus 3.4 requires version 7 of the Java Virtual Machine. Make sure that your CLOUD_OPTS settings in the /etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.conf file either do not set --java-home, or that --java-home points to a version 7 JVM. This needs to happen before services are started but after the upgraded packages are installed.
